<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <record_update table="v_plugin"> <v_plugin action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <active>active</active> <available_version>1.0.0</available_version> <definition><![CDATA[<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?> <plugin id="com.snc.platform.security.oauth.legacy" name="OAuth 2.0 legacy (do not activate...use 'OAuth 2.0' instead)" version="1.0.0" state="published" provider_name="ServiceNow" cache_flush="true"> <description>Legacy implementation of OAuth 2.0. Please instead install com.snc.platform.security.oauth. </description>
<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="OAuthCryptoGenerator" class="com.snc.platform.security.oauth.certificate.generator.OAuthCryptoGenerator"/> <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="OAuthEntityBuilder" class="com.snc.platform.security.oauth.scriptable.OAuthEntityBuilder"/> <extension point="com.glide.ui.login_redirect" name="OAuthLoginRedirect" class="com.snc.platform.security.oauth.login.OAuthLoginRedirect"/> <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="OAuthAPI" class="com.snc.platform.security.oauth.OAuthAPI"/> <extension point="com.glide.sys.user" name="GlideOAuthClient" class="com.snc.platform.security.oauth.client.GlideOAuthClient"/> </plugin> ]]></definition> <description>Legacy implementation of OAuth 2.0. Please instead install com.snc.platform.security.oauth.</description> <has_demo_data>false</has_demo_data> <help/> <id>com.snc.platform.security.oauth.legacy</id> <licensable>false</licensable> <name>OAuth 2.0 legacy (do not activate...use 'OAuth 2.0' instead)</name> <path>plugin://com.snc.platform.security.oauth.legacy/</path> <provider>ServiceNow</provider> <requires/> <scope>global</scope> <state>published</state> <supports_rollback>false</supports_rollback> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2017-12-05 06:05:22</sys_created_on> <sys_id>c.platform.security.oauth.legacy</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2017-12-05 06:05:22</sys_updated_on> <trackable>false</trackable> <type/> <version>1.0.0</version> </v_plugin> </record_update>
